ValidationRule.description: SFDC-10752: International Demo promo code is not allowed for Domestic Quotes. So no quotes with Account's Sub-theater as Canada or US.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Promo__r.PromoCode__c == 'International Demo Conversion Promo', OR( SBQQ__Account__r.Terr_Sub_Theater__c == 'CANADA - SUB THEATER', SBQQ__Account__r.Terr_Sub_Theater__c == 'US - SUB THEATER' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You may not use the "International Demo Conversion Promo' for a US or Canada Quote.
